attributes.long-description:
Experience the mesmerizing world of Dreii, the award-winning collaborative physics conundrum. 

Dreii is a puzzling game about skill, logic and friendship. It subtly connects players in real-time across the world, to help one another in a battle against gravity.

• Build a Tower. The mission is simple. But once again, things get in the way... Explosives, thunderstorms, completely incompetent colleagues. Oh, and have you heard of this thing called gravity?

• Play with your friends. Dreii automatically connects all screens across all platforms. This means you can even play with your friends who have Dreii on their mobiles and desktop computers 

• Made for PlayStation®4 and 'PS Vita'. Dreii plays beautifully on PlayStation®4 and 'PS Vita'. From the beginning it was engineered and optimized for Sony's systems, taking advantage of the intuitive controls and the pretty 'PS Vita' display.

• Speak in 19 Languages. Dreii allows players to speak to others, wherever they are in the world.

Purchasing this content entitles you to both the PS4™ system and “PS Vita” system versions!

1 player(s)
Network Players 2-3
Network Features
10000KB Minimum
Touchscreen
Dual Analog Sticks

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One time license fee entitles play on up to 3 PlayStation® Vita systems activated by this account.
